website_summaries.verdict: A unique way to level an unused RV trailer that offers more secure points of contact using four scissor jacks.
pros: Comes with a set of four independently leveling scissor jacks for each corner of an RV trailer
Allows you to adjust and position each jack to find the optimal point of contact
Each jack is easy to raise and lower with included tool
cons: Requires more time to set up and secure using four jacks instead of just one

customer_reviews.title: Best investment for my Baja Mity Lite
customer_reviews.text: Purchasing this scissor jack set was the best investment, by far, for my toy hauler. The jacks are heavy duty and well built. The 24" height comes in handy for camping on uneven ground. The kit includes bolts which will work just fine, but I replaced mine with a nut and bolt combo with thread locker. The set also includes a 3/4" bit, which I found to be a little shallow. If you'll be using an impact, like me, I would reccomend a deep 3/4" socket, or you will damage the socket head ends of each jack. I would highly recommend these, if you're using the old bottle neck style jacks, like I was.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin S

customer_reviews.title: I am well pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I must confess, I wasn't sure about these jacks when I ordered them, but they exceed my expectations greatly. I was able to jack up the four sides of my 3,500 travel trailer (RV) just using my 20v Black and Decker cordless drill and the drill attachment that they provided. I don't know if they meant to do so, but they included 2 of the attachments, which is really great, because I already lost the one that I had for my trailer jack. I am well pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J

customer_reviews.title: For the price, its like stealing.
customer_reviews.text: Freaking Awesome stabilizes like it should, ignore the bad reviews... you aren't supposed to use this to jack up an trailer but using it to stabilize and level it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Sir J

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap quality. I don't recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, but very poor quality materials used to manufacture. We backed into a spot that was on an incline and when the jack hit the ground, it folded up completely! The jacks that were on there previously have never done that. They would plow right through the dirt. Now I have to buy other ones to replace these ones. Not a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Steele

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stabilizers at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! Great price for this set of RV/Camper scissor jacks. The manufacturing of these is top-notch, high quality, and easy to attach under my RV. Was very impressed with the width of these compared to an auto jack, that I was originally using... to no avail, as it bent, These are sturdy, with a low profile when not expanded and also fit great in a small cabinet within my RV, before I attached them. The handle tool, bolts, and socket were put to good use. This is a great product that I recommend to everyone that needs to level an RV/camper or other. Thank you for making this available on Amazon and being of high quality! THX!!!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jacks work good, poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Work great, installation isn’t fun but no one likes drilling holes up side down. Only reason for the 3stars is they were damaged when I received them. I was able to fix with a hammer but the packaging for a heavy item wasn’t sufficient. My wife messaged them about the damage and we never received a reply, I guess that is acceptable to them.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana Fam

customer_reviews.title: Good quality stabilizers
customer_reviews.text: First of all, these are not for lifting, just slight leveling and stabilization. Good quality, and comes with everything you need. Whether you plan on mounting them permanently, or positioning under every time. Go up really quick with the supplied drill adapter. I have only used them once, we will se how they hold up. At first glance, they seem like a sturdy stabilizer for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Erickson

customer_reviews.title: stability
customer_reviews.text: This product is an excellent addition to our older motor home. the difficulty for the install was due to the age of the motorhome & the available spots to install. I had to weld in extra spacers to get the stabilizers level (because of frame). other wise they work awesome and easy to use. Product arrived ahead of schedule delivery and is every thing they were promoted to be
customer_reviews.author: James Fromm

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for the cost. I bought these so I wouldn't have to level my trailer. I bought an oversized one so I could basically take an impact drill to the jack and lift the whole trailer. the trailer is about 3000 pounds and works great. Only problem is if you back off of the jack too far, it will cause the crimp on the thread to move which will make your jack not want to stay up while you are driving. so if you dont back it up too far then it will work great. Anyway a good product and worth it for me
customer_reviews.author: Captain Ricky Bobby

customer_reviews.title: I was very surprised at how stout these are. ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at how stout these are. I installed them on my 16' hybrid toy hauler/pop-up, and using just one jack and the drive socket in my M12 Milwaukee pocket drill, it will pick both tires on each side off the ground. (Not that that's what I will be doing with them, but I wanted to see how strong they were.) My camper is very stable now.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph zelinsky

customer_reviews.title: A product whose purchase gave me a lift.
customer_reviews.text: For their modest price these screw jacks (aka stabilizers) were ruggedly built and heavier than what I was expecting. If they are used in the manner prescribed they should last forever. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: asimov

customer_reviews.title: The 5000# jacks are just right they are nice and heavy weight
customer_reviews.text: The 5000# jacks are just right they are nice and heavy weight! I used these jacks alone with the 4 that came on my 35foot trailer. I haven't mounted them just yet so that I can find the right spots to mount them. The jacks work great for stopping the bouncing of the trailer and with 8 jacks you can lift it up a bit!
customer_reviews.author: Arg

customer_reviews.title: Not really an issue with the jacks themselves, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Not really an issue with the jacks themselves, but I forgot to measure the distance between the bolt holes on our camper and the bolt holds don't line up. I guess I just figured they would because the jacks have wide holes. However, we were still able to use them and the camper does seem more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Wow I took a chance on these stabilizers as they were so reasonably priced. Glad I did because they are great! It took me approximately 45 minutes to install these on my camper. They also came with a bit that I put on my drill and I can stabilize my camper in ten minutes or less.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Two are broken and they aren't even 6 months old.
customer_reviews.text: Update. Two of these have now broken and they aren't even 6 moths old. Definitely would lean towards another brand. Had to replace ours after a camping accident. We had to redrill where the holes lined up but other than that they were fine
customer_reviews.author: jkmom

customer_reviews.title: Cheap..
customer_reviews.text: Opened up the pack and get to installing. Installed 3 units on my travel trailer only to find the 4th has a deformed mounting bracket. Unable to get in touch with manufacturer just to get a bracket. Only option would be to remove the 3 and send all 4 back. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: jrdbrn

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: purchased a little over a year ago and it's already showing signs of rust - I guess I may have another year and will have to replace, will probably try another manufacturer.

customer_reviews.title: Well built, well priced.
customer_reviews.text: Very reasonable priced, sturdy and built for their intended purpose. Don't recommend trying to lift your 5000 lb. trailer with them but they can and will. They make short work of leveling and stabilizing my trailer at the campsite.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 1991 Ford Four Winds which didn't come with any stock stabilizers. It took a little time to install, having to drill holes in the frame to mount but the time was well spent, my 30 foot RV is completely solid.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Little drilling and decided to bolt mine instead of using there self tapping screws that came with them. Bolted them on my 22 ft camper they look great and keep our camper is steady as a rock.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.text: We needed to change out the ones on our RV and these are so much better. They went on in about 30 mins easily and were so much more sturdy than they ones that came on the RV. Very pleased with this purchase and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Nofire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, We have an older trailer and we were ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, We have an older trailer and we were using cheap stabilizers that had to be cranked by hand. These are perfect for us. Quick, easy installation if you are a DIY'er. Would purchase again. Well made, works great with the drill
customer_reviews.author: good product

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement jack kit,good hardware kit
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy.Comes with self tapping screws that truly work.Turned them into holes less than half the size of a 3/8 thread.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, had to predrill new holes.
customer_reviews.text: Had to predrill holes, they didn't fit the same as the original that came with our 2009 Outback RV. But the look great and work great.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: A great value . Well made. Use them in a commercial poultry barn to shore up a 500lb feed bin.

customer_reviews.title: The metal is embossed to make them stronger.
customer_reviews.text: My camper weights 5000 lbs. so I bought 5000 lb. jacks. Probably didn't need 5000 lb. jacks since they only hold up part of the load each. Consequently the mounting holes didn't line up. Drilled out some holes and used two bolts for each jack and they work fine. The metal is embossed to make them stronger, almost missed that fact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for our camper!
customer_reviews.text: Working great on my canned ham camper. We used to wake up our daughter getting into the camper due to the shaking and now it is stable. The drill attachment is a huge time saver.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job extremely easy with a hand drill

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Installed on my 37 foot travel trailer

I have electric stabilizers jacks on now and do not use as these are more stable and just as quick. Highly recommend.

I highly recommend this product.

product_meta.title: LIBRA Set of 4 5000 lb 24" RV Trailer Stabilizer Leveling Scissor Jacks w/Dual Power Drill Sockets & Complete Set of Mounting Hardware -Model# 26050
product_meta.description: Warning:These stabilizer jacks are designed for RV stabilizing and leveling purpose only. NEVER use for lifting, changing tires or supporting weight of any vehicles. Improper use can result in property damage, serious injury or death.
feature_bullets: Stablizing and leveling your RV/Trailer, Remains steady on soft surfaces because of wide bow-tie base
Includes 4 steel jacks and 1 crank handle, also include a 3/4" hex magnetic socket to raise/lower jack faster by power drill!
Complete installation kit included: 16 pcs 3/8" mounting screws & one matching 9/16" socket, a 11/36" mounting hole drill bit, one set of drilling guide sticker, everything you need for install!
Capacity: 5,000 lbs per jack. Bulit by same material some other brand marked "up to 7500lbs"
Extended height: 24", Retracted height: 5", Retracted length:26-1/2", width: 7.5"

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars298 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
